entries.title: Collecting User Input and Saving to database
entries.body: Today I learned that if you have starter data (that doesn't include an id property) in your database... The result will be a 500 error...

entries.title: May The Fourth Be With You
entries.body: Stocking the database with a few more entries.....

entries.title: A Very Sad Entry Indeed
entries.body: Sad entries are needed in order to filter by various moods... And this one will find out if the radio buttons reset...

entries.title: This should fix our select filter bug
